Sequence Information.Peptide Name: P2 (Val-rich; natural AMPs; bacteriocin, bacteria, prokaryotes; UCLL1a; BBMm)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (66.67%) toP1V: 43%, L: 21%, K: 14%. GRAVY: 1.85; M Wt: 1617.112; Mol formula: C78H138N16O17S1; Mol ex coeff: 1490.Activity: active against S. aureus TISTR 517 (MIC 8 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 142 (MIC 8 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 1096 (MIC 8 ug/ml), MRSA isolate 2468 (MIC 8 ug/ml).
Literature Information.Author: Songnaka N, Lertcanawanichakul M, Hutapea AM, Krobthong S, Yingchutrakul Y, Atipairin A. 2022
Literature Information.Title: Purification and Characterization of Novel Anti-MRSA Peptides Produced by Brevibacillus sp. SPR-20.
